name: Pyrohydra
description: The Pyrohydra is a huge creature with multiple fire-breathing heads, known for its impressive regenerative abilities and physical strength.
memorable: Its ability to regrow heads makes it a persistent threat in combat.
goals: To ambush intruders and dominate its environment, often utilizing poisonous water around its lair.
relations: Often found in watery environments; may encounter or serve alongside other aquatic monstrosities.
environment: Typically resides in aquatic locales, capable of both land and underwater ambushes.
strengths: Exceptional physical stats in Strength and Constitution, grants it high durability and survival potential during combat encounters.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence limits tactical maneuvers and decisions in combat.
attacks: Can execute multiple bite attacks with each head, delivering deadly piercing damage, alongside a devastating fire breath attack.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath allows it to deal massive area-of-effect fire damage to multiple enemies.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 15, indicating a high awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for 1 hour.
Regenerates heads unless specific damage types are dealt.
Can take multiple reactions due to its available heads.
Water near its lair is poisoned, posing additional threats to intruders.
Utilizes legendary actions for strategic mobility and grappling.
